bio: People Inspirited by Mynimo get much better treatment than those around them. Hey! That's not fair!

soultimate.name: Just for You
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Defense by 350% for 30 seconds
soultimate.description: Defense greatly increased, and foes focus on you.

skill.effect: No longer attracts attention from foes.
skill.name: Free Pass

name: Mynimo
